summary: Route ordering causes potential shadowing of /admin/agents by /admin, making the admin agent dashboard unreachable in some configurations.

issues.description: The /admin router is mounted before /admin/agents. If billingAdminRouter defines a catch-all or 404 handler, it can intercept /admin/agents and prevent adminAgentRouter from ever being reached.
issues.explanation: Mounting the more specific /admin/agents route before /admin guarantees it is matched first and prevents accidental interception by the broader /admin router.
